member.name: T:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects
member.summary: Class that allows comparison of two objects of the same type to each other. Supports classes, lists, arrays, dictionaries, child comparison and more.

member.name: F:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects._parents
member.summary: Keep track of parent objects in the object hiearchy

member.name: F:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects._propertyCache
member.summary: Reflection Cache for property info

member.name: F:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects._fieldCache
member.summary: Reflection Cache for field info

member.name: F:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects._methodList
member.summary: Reflection Cache for methods

member.name: M:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.#ctor
member.summary: Set up defaults for the comparison

member.name: M:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.Compare(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Compare two objects of the same type to each other.
member.remarks: Check the Differences or DifferencesString Properties for the differences. Default MaxDifferences is 1 for performance

member.name: M:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.ClearCache
member.summary: Reflection properties and fields are cached. By default this cache is cleared automatically after each compare.

member.name: M:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.Compare(System.Object,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Compare two objects
member.param: Where we are in the object hiearchy

member.summary: Compare an objct of type URI

member.summary: Compare an object of type Type (Runtime type)

member.summary: Compare all columns in a data row

member.summary: Compare all rows in a data table

member.summary: Compare all tables and all rows in all tables

member.summary: Get a method by name

member.summary: Get the cached methods for a type

member.summary: Convert an object to a nicely formatted string

member.name: M:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.AddBreadCrumb(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a breadcrumb to an existing breadcrumb

member.name: M:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.AddBreadCrumb(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a breadcrumb to an existing breadcrumb

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.ElementsToIgnore
member.summary: Ignore classes, properties, or fields by name during the comparison. Case sensitive.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.ComparePrivateProperties
member.summary: If true, private properties and fields will be compared. The default is false. Silverlight and WinRT restricts access to private variables.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.ComparePrivateFields
member.summary: If true, private fields will be compared. The default is false. Silverlight and WinRT restricts access to private variables.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CompareStaticProperties
member.summary: If true, static properties will be compared. The default is true.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CompareStaticFields
member.summary: If true, static fields will be compared. The default is true.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CompareChildren
member.summary: If true, child objects will be compared. The default is true. If false, and a list or array is compared list items will be compared but not their children.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CompareReadOnly
member.summary: If true, compare read only properties (only the getter is implemented). The default is true.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CompareFields
member.summary: If true, compare fields of a class (see also CompareProperties). The default is true.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CompareProperties
member.summary: If true, compare properties of a class (see also CompareFields). The default is true.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.MaxDifferences
member.summary: The maximum number of differences to detect

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.Differences
member.summary: The differences found during the compare

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.DifferencesString
member.summary: The differences found in a string suitable for a textbox

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.AutoClearCache
member.summary: Reflection properties and fields are cached. By default this cache is cleared after each compare. Set to false to keep the cache for multiple compares.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.Caching
member.summary: By default properties and fields for types are cached for each compare. By default this cache is cleared after each compare.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.AttributesToIgnore
member.summary: A list of attributes to ignore a class, property or field

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.IgnoreObjectTypes
member.summary: If true, objects will be compared ignore their type diferences

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.IsUseCustomTypeComparer
member.summary: Func that determine when use CustomComparer for comparing specific type. Default value return permanent false value.

member.name: P:KellermanSoftware.CompareNetObjects.CompareObjects.CustomComparer
member.summary: Action that performed for comparing objects. T1: contain current CompareObjects T2: object1 for comparing T3: object1 for comparing T4: current CompareObjects breadcrumb
